title: Profile Showing Old Name
body:
Hello!

A few months ago, I got a name change (currently Zyreck), but I never bothered using the League boards. [The result, well, I still see my old name and icon when I go on my boards profile.](http://i.imgur.com/5OKB1aO.png) Additionally, when I log on to my smurf that owns the name Solstice, it shows the boards profile from this account. Basically I have two accounts showing the same thing on the boards.

Is there any chance you guys would be willing to correct these accounts for me?

Thank you for your time!

Edit: Included an image.

replies.body:
I checked your boards profile, and it looks like it's showing your normal profile: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Zyreck

I attempted to refresh your boards account just in case, so hopefully things will fall into order in no time!
